item.title: How i add commands and how i make admins
item.dc:creator: @viruz_3 viruz 3
item.description:
@viruz_3 wrote:

If you want to add a command …

Find a command like “barrows” in client.java
and add a command using the same code as the command above it…
(Copy and Paste …lol)
Then add this line below all the commands:

			else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("COMMAND HERE")) // If you want this to be a Admin command only then add && playerRights => 2
			{
			          //COMMAND CODE HERE
			}

I’m not quite sure how to make an admin in PimpScape … srry

ENJOY

Read full topic

item.title: How i add commands and how i make admins
item.dc:creator: @udluv2 udluv2
item.description:
@udluv2 wrote:

To make some1 a admin go to their character file and change their rites to

3 - owner rights
2 - admin rights
1 - mod rights
0 - noob rights (no rights)

To add commands serach for a command like it and add it under it.

Eg if your adding a tele command search for fish or something like that and add it under it.

If your adding a item command sarch for tools and add under that.

Read full topic
